text: Filistiaba Sol mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir dughiamɨn, Nerɨn otarim Apner, ghua Solɨn otarim Isboset2:8 Gumazir kamɨn ziam Isboset, a guizbangɨra, Isbal o Esbal. (Nɨ 1 Eghaghaniba 8:33ɨn gan.) Ezɨ Hibrun akam ziam Isbal an akar kamɨn mɨrara ghu, “Balɨn gumazim.” Bal an asemɨn ziam, egha gumaziba ua ziar kam Bal osiran aghua, egha me a giragha kamaghɨn osiri, “Boset,” an akar kamɨn mɨrara ghu, “aghumsɨzir bizim.” inigha ghua, Jordanɨn Fanem abigha ghua Mahanaimɨn nguibar ekiamɨn oto. Apner Solɨn mɨdorozir gumazibar faragha zuir gumazir dapanim.
